author: abdel.stark
content: <@&652918665943056397> <@&602872761743835146> <@!758579010027782144> The testnet is ready for performance testing. We will be able to start when we have some Nethermind nodes on the testnet. Given the timeline is pretty short, do you have a rough estimate on when you will be ready ?

author: lightclient
content: i have the consensus changes complete and added support for non-typed 1559 tx, just working through a few issues connecting to the testnet

author: abdel.stark
content: Yep. Sorry, to be clear, I don't need your implementation to do the performance testing since I already have synced Geth nodes that I can update later on. Only Nethermind nodes are missing

author: abdel.stark
content: But I am glad we are close to do a first integration test with your implementation

author: marekm3498
content: I fixed the initial problems that Tomek mentioned. I run a local node (not connected to ethstats yet). Node is processing blocks right now. I will continue my work tomorrow. Hopefully, I manage to add nodes soon.
